    public class CompositeAgentLoader

    Andrei Olaru

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Specified by:
        getName in interface AgentLoader

      • setConfig

        public AgentLoader setConfig(net.xqhs.util.XML.XMLTree.XMLNode configuration)
        Description copied from interface: AgentLoader
        Configures the loader by passing the XML node in the scenario. The loader can extract the necessary settings.

        The method should not perform any initializations that can fail. These should be done in the AgentLoader.load(AgentCreationData) method.

        Specified by:
        setConfig in interface AgentLoader
        Parameters:
        configuration - the XML node containing the configuration of the loader.
        Returns:
        the instance itself.

      • preload

        public boolean preload(AgentCreationData agentCreationData,
              PlatformLoader platformLoader,
              net.xqhs.util.logging.Logger log)
        Description copied from interface: AgentLoader
        The method checks potential problems that could appear in the creation of an agent, as specified by the information in the argument. Potential problems relate, for example, to inexistent classes.

        The method may also add information to the agent creation data, in order to speed up the loading process.

        WARNING: Calling this method before AgentLoader.load(AgentCreationData) may not be optional. This method may affect the AgentCreationData instance.

        This method may contact the platform loader for details on the platform.

        If the agent will surely not be able to load, false will be returned. For any non-fatal issues, the method should return true and output warnings in the specified log.

        Specified by:
        preload in interface AgentLoader
        Parameters:
        agentCreationData - - the AgentCreationData, as loaded by Boot from the scenario file.
        platformLoader - - the PlatformLoader that will be used to load the agent.
        log - - the Logger in which to output any potential problems (as warnings or errors).
        Returns:
        true if no fatal issues were found; false otherwise.

      • load

        public AgentManager load(AgentCreationData agentCreationData)
        Description copied from interface: AgentLoader
        The method loads all the information necessary for the creation of an agent and returns an AgentManager instance used to manage the lifecycle of the loaded agent.

        WARNING: It is important to pre-load additional agent creation data using AgentLoader.preload(AgentCreationData, PlatformLoader, Logger). Lacking this operation, the agent may not laod correctly.

        Specified by:
        load in interface AgentLoader
        Parameters:
        agentCreationData - - the AgentCreationData, as loaded by Boot from the scenario file.
        Returns:
        an AgentManager for the loaded agent.
